description.value: Externally defined table of codes specifying a National Uniform Billing Committee (NUBC) code that identifies an event that relates to the payment of a claim. In the US, NUBC codes generally used, see code system 2.16.840.1.113883.6.301.8; more information may be found at http://www.nubc.org/become.html. The UB-04 Data Specifications Manual with the codes is available by subscription from NUBC at http://www.nubc.org/become.html.
